title: Best of The Herd: 01/24/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 01/24/2019
description:
Colin just isn't all that impressed with what James Harden is doing because he is just playing by himself and taking as many shots as he wants.  He thinks Tom Brady has done an amazing job handling superstardom and still finding a way to get his team to buy in.  Plus, Greg Cosell of NFL Films talks about how the Patriots will try to defend a very talented and efficient Rams offense in the Super Bowl.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
